title: How to Make Friends
alt: No, wait, come back! I want to be friends at you!
transcript:
[First panel with words, with the words in the center white and on a black oval background, which is in turn on the white background:]
Presenting:How to make friends[Second panel with Cueball and Hairy facing each other:]
Cueball: Want to go eat food together?
Cueball: We could also sit together and talk without eating. I don't need to eat. I mean, I do need to eat. But if you don't want to eat then we can just talk. I can eat later.[Third panel with words, same format as first panel:]
OkayIt turns out I still haven't figured out how to do this.Sorry
